directions: Place the Gorgonzola cheese, oregano, garlic, tarragon, basil, olive oil, milk, and vinegar in a blender or food processor. Blend until smooth.
In a large bowl, toss the Gorgonzola dressing with lettuce, avocado, and walnuts.
ingredients: 2 heads Boston lettuce, cored and shredded
title: Gorgonzola Cheese Salad
